Facebook - Sitewide Pixel

parameter.value:
<!-- Facebook Pixel Code -->
<script>
  !function(f,b,e,v,n,t,s)
  {if(f.fbq)return;n=f.fbq=function(){n.callMethod?
  n.callMethod.apply(n,arguments):n.queue.push(arguments)};
  if(!f._fbq)f._fbq=n;n.push=n;n.loaded=!0;n.version='2.0';
  n.queue=[];t=b.createElement(e);t.async=!0;
  t.src=v;s=b.getElementsByTagName(e)[0];
  s.parentNode.insertBefore(t,s)}(window, document,'script',
  'https://connect.facebook.net/en_US/fbevents.js');
  fbq('init', '{{Facebook Pixel ID}}');
</script>
<!-- End Facebook Pixel Code -->

tag.name: Facebook - Add Payment Info

parameter.value:
<script>
  fbq('track', 'AddPaymentInfo', {
    contents: {{js - Facebook - Content IDs - Checkout Page}},
    content_type: 'product_group',
    currency: '{{dlv - Global - Currency Code}}',
    value: '{{dlv - Cart Total}}'
  },
  {
    eventID: '{{dlv - event_id}}'
  });
</script>

map.value: dlv - Cart Total,dlv - Global - Currency Code

tag.name: GA4 - Purchase

map.value: {{dlv - Thank You Page - Customer Lifetime Value}}
{{dlv - Thank You Page - Customer Total Order Count}}
{{dlv - Thank You Page - Coupon Code Name}}

tag.name: Facebook - Purchase

parameter.value:
<!-- Facebook Pixel Code -->
<script>
  !function(f,b,e,v,n,t,s)
  {if(f.fbq)return;n=f.fbq=function(){n.callMethod?
  n.callMethod.apply(n,arguments):n.queue.push(arguments)};
  if(!f._fbq)f._fbq=n;n.push=n;n.loaded=!0;n.version='2.0';
  n.queue=[];t=b.createElement(e);t.async=!0;
  t.src=v;s=b.getElementsByTagName(e)[0];
  s.parentNode.insertBefore(t,s)}(window, document,'script',
  'https://connect.facebook.net/en_US/fbevents.js');
  fbq('init', '{{Facebook Pixel ID}}', { 
    em: '{{dlv - Thank You Page - Customer Email}}', 
    external_id: '{{dlv - Customer ID}}', 
    ga_id: '{{cookie - GA Client ID}}', 
    customer_type: '{{js - New Customer - Yes or No}}', 
    ph: '{{dlv - Thank You Page - Customer Phone Number}}',
    fn: '{{dlv - Thank You Page - Customer First Name}}',
    ln: '{{dlv - Thank You Page - Customer Last Name}}',
    ct: '{{dlv - Thank You Page - Customer City}}',
    st: '{{dlv - Thank You Page - Customer Province Code}}',
    zp: '{{dlv - Thank You Page - Customer Zip}}',
    country: '{{dlv - Thank You Page - Customer Country Code}}',
    });
  fbq('track', 'PageView');
  fbq('track', 'Purchase', {
   value: {{dlv - Thank You Page - Order Subtotal}},
   contents: {{js - Facebook - Content IDs - Thank You Page}},
   order_id: '{{dlv - Thank You Page - Order ID}}',
   content_type: 'product_group',
   currency: '{{dlv - Global - Currency Code}}',
  },
  {
    eventID: '{{dlv - event_id}}'
  });
</script>
<!-- End Facebook Pixel Code -->

map.value: dlv - Customer Email,dlv - Thank You Page - Order Revenue,dlv - Global - Currency Code,dlv - Thank You Page - Order Subtotal

tag.name: Conversion Linker
Facebook Server Side Events
tag.notes:
To Dos:

1. Update the URL to match your subdomain created for your GTM server side container
2. Update the events you want to track with CAPI and update the trigger. We recommend keeping view content, add to cart, initiate checkout. 
3. Update your Product ID if you use different identifier in catalog
4. Update FB Test Event code (for QA)

Please follow the guides outlined in your Elevar App and our help guide here:

https://knowledge.getelevar.com/server-side-tagging

Event - purchase
trigger.notes:
This event is setup to support GTM Suite from Elevar version 2.0 with the event name changes. The dl_ is added to prevent conflicts with the native Google Shopping App that pushes event hits to the data layer without the dl_.
.
Contact for questions - help@getelevar.com

variable.name: dlv - Thank You Page - Customer First Name
js - Google Ads - Product View - Shopify US ID
variable.notes:
If you'd like to adjust from variant SKU to product id, variant id, or shopify_US_ type of id then use the examples below to update row 6. Note the only part that is changed is "id" in product.id in the above.

'id': product.id

to this:

'id': product.product_id

OR 

'id': product.variant_id

OR 

'id': "shopify_US_" + product.product_id + "_" + product.variant_id

variable.name: GA4 ID
variable.notes:
Enter your GAv4 property ID.

It should start with a G-

help@getelevar.com

change: products.id

to this:

products.product_id

OR 

products.variant_id

variable.name: js - ecomm - Product View - Shopify US ID
variable.notes:
If you'd like to adjust from variant SKU to product id, variant id, or shopify_US_ type of id then use the examples below to update row 6. Note the only part that is changed is "id" in product.id in the above.

'id': product.id

to this:

'id': product.product_id

OR 

'id': product.variant_id

OR 

'id': "shopify_US_" + product.product_id + "_" + product.variant_id

variable.name: Combined Google Analytics - UA
variable.notes:
To Do's:

2. If you need to anonymize IP addresses then under fields to set add: "anonymizeIp" with the value of "true"
